body_html:
I think the "poisson_lognormal_test" is broken due to this change.

TypeError: Expected int for argument 'nbins' not <tf.Tensor 'histogram/ToInt32:0' shape=() dtype=int32>.

https://source.cloud.google.com/results/invocation/28566b59-d961-458c-8978-b16dc248782f/%2F%2Ftensorflow%2Fcontrib%2Fdistributions:poisson_lognormal_test?page=log

I now also see these failures in our continuous builds. Could you take a look?

@vrv @hpucha looking at the state of things in the morning, we may want to revert this change temporarily to unblock everyone else.

body:
I think the "poisson_lognormal_test" is broken due to this change.
```
TypeError: Expected int for argument 'nbins' not <tf.Tensor 'histogram/ToInt32:0' shape=() dtype=int32>.
```

https://source.cloud.google.com/results/invocation/28566b59-d961-458c-8978-b16dc248782f/%2F%2Ftensorflow%2Fcontrib%2Fdistributions:poisson_lognormal_test?page=log

I now also see these failures in our continuous builds. Could you take a look?

@vrv @hpucha looking at the state of things in the morning, we may want to revert this change temporarily to unblock everyone else.
